Title: Mr. Right
Actors: Sam Rockwell, Anna Kendrick, Tim Roth, James Ransone
Plot: After going through a painful break-up, a woman meets a man who appears to be perfect for her. However, as their relationship develops, she learns that he is a former hit-man. Their new, but genuine, relationship is tested even further as they try to save each other, from his dark past which has come back to haunt him.
Production: Circle of Confusion, 3311 Productions, Amasia Entertainment
